item.title: icanhazip and CORS
item.description: I received an email from an icanhazip.com user last week about enabling cross-origin resource sharing. He wanted to use AJAX calls on a different site to pull data from icanhazip.com and use it for his visitors. Those headers are now available for all requests to the services provided by icanhazip.com! Here’s what you’ll see: $ curl -i icanhazip.com --- Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET ---
